content.description:
A short overhanging arete that gets walked by, by everyone who parks in the main lot on busy summer days.  This is a line that I have looked at over the years and we finally climbed the other day.  

  Sit start on a crimp on the right side of the arete and one under the roof on the left side. Climb the arete using fun holds to a casual top out.
content.location: On the Meadows side of the parking lot, plainly visible 15 feet from the lot.

content.description: This area encompasses the area from the stairs leading up to Flesh for Lulu over to the right to the Arrow Head Boulder. Through the middle of this area flows the small drainage that comes down from where the ice climb Frankie Lee forms.
